author: alita85
content: hey @here please don't forget to comment any features you'd like to see for the bot here: https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/59

author: alita85
content: I'm going to be collecting all requests into a product requirement document. This will be used to request funding for added features.

author: sky.cactus
content: I would love to get CI moved over to GitHub actions, and I think that piece is where most "bot feature requests" would apply.  If you can't find things to add to the merge bot, then I think it would be pretty easy to get feature requests for CI which we could iteratively add to a separate GitHub action step to complement the existing CI we have.  And with feature requests, hopefully sweet grant money.  ðŸ˜„
